column4: Serious question for the group: Toshi Satellite P100; I can't play any audio, but it seems that the sound device is properly detected and the keyboard hotkeys even trigger muting like they should.  Any suggestions?
you need the toshiba hotkey tools package
to clarify... hotkeys work but no audio...  are you sure I need a hotkeys pack to fix it (and if so... google or Toshi site?)
